attributes.action: hold a general election to allow voters to choose the next prime minister before you quit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is believed the majority of the electorate want a general election to choose who they want to be the next prime minister,not allow an unelected leader to become prime minister.it is not a given right to the position

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
